verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Everybody’s gonna know, Everybody’s gonna know, Everybody’s gonna know Who Jesus is.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He’s the lily of the valley, He’s the bright and morning star, He’s the fairest of ten thousand. Everybody’s gonna know.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He’s the mystery of the ages, He’s the lamb of God once slain. He’s our hope and resurrection. Everybody’s gonna know.{/lang-eng}
